import star from '../../assets/images/estrela.png' import * as S from './styles' type Props = { id: string title: string avaliacao: number descricao: string capa: string tags: string[] } const RestaurantCard = ({ avaliacao, capa, descricao, id, title, tags }: Props) => { return ( {tags.map((tag) => ( {tag} ))}

{title}

{avaliacao}

{descricao}

Saiba Mais ) } export default RestaurantCard
